attributes.action: refer all apparent and reported violations of The Geneva Convention to be dealt with as War Crimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Courts Martial system of justice has again proved that is in not able to deal with allegations of cruelty and more against "prisoners of war" by virtue of the fact that yet again no British Soldiers were held responsible for the death of an Iraqi prisoner.

Any violation of the Geneva Convention should be dealt with as a War crime and not dealt with internally by means of Courts Martial, or at least be dealt with by the Iraqi legal system.

All service personnel named in the investigation of the death of a hotel worker should be tried as war criminals.

The mere allegations of such acts is a disgrace to a long history and previous high regard for the British Armed Services.
